card.name: Army of the Damned
card.text:
Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

card.name: Bad Moon
card.text: Black creatures get +1/+1.

card.name: Barter in Blood
card.text: Each player sacrifices two creatures.

card.name: Cackling Fiend
card.text: When Cackling Fiend enters, each opponent discards a card.

card.name: Call to the Grave
card.text:
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a non-Zombie creature.
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Call to the Grave.

card.name: Cemetery Reaper
card.text:
Other Zombie creatures you control get +1/+1.
{2}{B}, {T}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Death Baron
card.text: Skeletons you control and other Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch.

card.name: Delirium Skeins
card.text: Each player discards three cards.

card.name: Diregraf Ghoul
card.text: Diregraf Ghoul enters tapped.

card.name: Dread Slaver
card.text: Whenever a creature dealt damage by Dread Slaver this turn dies, return it to the battlefield under your control. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Endless Ranks of the Dead
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, create X 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens, where X is half the number of Zombies you control, rounded down.

card.name: Fleshbag Marauder
card.text: When Fleshbag Marauder enters, each player sacrifices a creature.

card.name: Ghoulraiser
card.text: When Ghoulraiser enters, return a Zombie card at random from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Gluttonous Zombie
card.text: Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Grave Betrayal
card.text: Whenever a creature you don't control dies, return it to the battlefield under your control with an additional +1/+1 counter on it at the beginning of the next end step. That creature is a black Zombie in addition to its other colors and types.

card.name: Grave Titan
card.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Grave Titan enters or attacks, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Infectious Horror
card.text: Whenever Infectious Horror attacks, each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Intimidation
card.text: Creatures you control have fear. (They can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

card.name: Liliana's Reaver
card.text:
Deathtouch
Whenever Liliana's Reaver deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card and you create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

card.name: Maalfeld Twins
card.text: When Maalfeld Twins dies, create two 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

card.name: Necrosavant
card.text: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.

card.name: Nested Ghoul
card.text: Whenever a source deals damage to Nested Ghoul, create a 2/2 black Phyrexian Zombie creature token.

card.name: Nocturnal Raid
card.text: Black creatures get +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Noxious Ghoul
card.text: Whenever Noxious Ghoul or another Zombie enters, all non-Zombie creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

card.name: Plague Wind
card.text: Destroy all creatures you don't control. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Raving Dead
card.text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose an opponent at random. Raving Dead attacks that player this combat if able.
Whenever Raving Dead deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded down.

card.name: Sibsig Icebreakers
card.text: When Sibsig Icebreakers enters, each player discards a card.

card.name: Smallpox
card.text: Each player loses 1 life, discards a card, sacrifices a creature, then sacrifices a land.

card.name: Soulless One
card.text: Soulless One's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Zombies on the battlefield plus the number of Zombie cards in all graveyards.

card.name: Sutured Ghoul
card.text:
Trample
As Sutured Ghoul enters, exile any number of creature cards from your graveyard.
Sutured Ghoul's power is equal to the total power of the exiled cards and its toughness is equal to their total toughness.

card.name: Syphon Flesh
card.text: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.

card.name: Twilight's Call
card.text:
You may cast Twilight's Call as though it had flash if you pay {2} more to cast it. (You may cast it any time you could cast an instant.)
Each player returns all creature cards from their graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Unbreathing Horde
card.text:
Unbreathing Horde enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each other Zombie you control and each Zombie card in your graveyard.
If Unbreathing Horde would be dealt damage, prevent that damage and remove a +1/+1 counter from it.

card.name: Undead Warchief
card.text:
Zombie spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Zombie creatures you control get +2/+1.

card.name: Vengeful Dead
card.text: Whenever Vengeful Dead or another Zombie dies, each opponent loses 1 life.

card.name: Wight of Precinct Six
card.text: Wight of Precinct Six gets +1/+1 for each creature card in your opponents' graveyards.

card.name: Zombie Apocalypse
card.text: Return all Zombie creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped, then destroy all Humans.

card.name: Zombie Brute
card.text:
Amplify 1 (As this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Zombie card you reveal in your hand.)
Trample
